doc:
Richard Berry (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Berry_(actor) 0 Richard Berry (born Richard Élie Benguigui, 31 July 1950) is a French actor, film director and screenwriter. He has appeared in more than 100 films since 1972. He starred in The Violin Player, which was entered into the 1994 Cannes Film Festival. Richard_Berry ( born Richard_Élie_Benguigui , 31_July_1950 ) is a_French_actor , film_director_and_screenwriter . He has_appeared in more_than_100_films since 1972 . He starred in The_Violin_Player , which was_entered into the_1994_Cannes_Film_Festival .
